comment.author: Benjamin
comment.text: Can you post more positive marketing? Like what makes your campaign great, instead of smearing the enemy. I know the Late Rev. Dr MLK would not use your current strategies even when facing Donald Trump. You can do better Hillary! Show em

replies.text: Tristan not relevant. He was a part of a civil movement for change. Civility is everything
